thread.title: Hamburgers considered for Russian cosmonauts
thread.title_full: Hamburgers considered for Russian cosmonauts | News24

author: news24.com
title: Hamburgers considered for Russian cosmonauts
text:
Moscow - Hamburgers could soon be debuting on Russian menus in space.
The Russian research institute responsible for designing meals for the country's cosmonauts said on Thursday it was prepared to consider them, after the head of the Russian branch of US fast-food giant Burger King suggested that it should add cheeseburgers in tubes, according to the website of the Kommersant newspaper.
"We're not opposed to this possibility, especially if the food tastes good and the cosmonauts like it," Lyudmila Pavlova, the head of the space food division at the Russian Academy of Sciences, was Quote: d as saying by ITAR-Tass.
However, some of the development team expressed aversion to bumping burgers onto the Russian space food menu.
